title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 1.4 - Method of producing vitamin D milk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 1.4 - Method of producing vitamin D milk

State Regulations

The following procedures for increasing the vitamin D
content of milk to at least 400 U.S.P. units per quart are hereby
approved: (a) adding concentrate of
vitamin D to milk prior to and at the place of pasteurization; (b) directly irradiating milk by means of
ultraviolet or carbon arc rays prior to and at the place of pasteurization; and
(c) feeding irradiated yeast to
the cow or cows on the dairy farm. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง
1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
